channel.title: I'm Jane Doe
channel.description: Recent content on I'm Jane Doe

item.title: First Clojure Project
item.description:
Creating Our First Clojure Project

Let’s continue with our tutorial. Today, I will explain how we can create a Clojure project. I decided to split this article into two parts: we will explain how to create a regular project and a web project, where we will create an API for some service.

Let’s start by creating a regular project. It won’t be an API, a library, or anything like that. I just want to demonstrate how to create a project, explain its structure, and everything else.

item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

Hi! I’m Gilmar Soares, a seasoned software developer with over 12 years of experience in the industry. I specialize in languages like Scala, Java, Python, and Go, and have worked on a range of projects involving complex systems, functional programming, and scalable architectures. My expertise extends to tools like Elasticsearch, Google Spanner, Finagle, and various modern build and testing frameworks.

Beyond coding, I am passionate about optimizing performance, solving problems efficiently, and helping teams deliver robust, high-quality software. I’ve also been exploring the intersection of technology with natural language processing, API development, and data analysis.
